template.name: operation time
template.pattern: \s*(Fock_2e Build|Kinetic Matrix|Potential Matrix|Fock_xc Build|Total Fock Matrix Build|Diagonalization) Time:.*s\s*
template.comment: ANY OF Fock_2e Build Time: 53.5s Kinetic Matrix Time: 0.0s Potential Matrix Time: 0.0s Fock_xc Build Time: 19.2s Total Fock Matrix Build Time: 27.0s Diagonalization Time: 0.1s
